## select variable

An rxjs operator used to select a specified slice from state and only emit when its value changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
select: <TState, TProps extends Extract<keyof TState, string>[] = Extract<keyof TState, string>[]>(props: Extract<keyof TState, string>[]) => (source: Observable<Immutable<TState>>) => Observable<Immutable<StateSlice<TState, TProps>>>
```
